item.title: Cacio e pepe
item.description: Made with only four ingredients, and ready in just 20 minutes, this cacio e pepe (which literally translates as cheese and pepper), is a brilliant Italian supper that’s super simple to make and tastes absolutely divine. See method Serves 4 5 mins to prepare and 15 mins to cook 546 calories / serving Ingredients 400g bucatini or spaghetti 60g butter 60g butter 1 tbsp freshly ground black pepper 100g Parmesan, grated Method
